paragraphs: The strange occurrences continue. Items have moved around mysteriously or even disappeared completely in some cases. And now the forest itself seems to have turned against us. Maybe the stories we heard are true. Maybe this part of the forest really is haunted. If you can send someone to help us, preferably someone with experience in fighting strange creatures and investigating unusual events, I'd really appreciate it.
Or, if you're feeling adventurous, why don't you come and check on the camp yourself? You might find the experience to be illuminating.
